titleStmt.title: Die Mercurii, 14 Martii, 1648. Resolved by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that Sir Iohn Stowell knight be proceeded against for life in the upper bench. ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Order to print dated: Die Mercurii 28. Martii, 1649. Signed: Hen. Scobell Cler. Parliament.
Reproductions of the originals in the Huntington Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
